ENL0C049DR3.000212.text: According to American media, COVID-19 originated from China and "was quickly spread around the world by air travelers who ran high fevers."

ENL0C049DR3.000214.text: The US One America News Network TV-channel (OANN) cited Greg Rubini, a US intelligence expert, who said that it "was genetically engineered as a Bio-Weapon at the Univ. of North Carolina BSL-3 Lab."

ENL0C049DR3.000215.text: it "was genetically engineered as a Bio-Weapon at the Univ. of North Carolina BSL-3 Lab."

ENL0C049DR3.000216.text: Independent analysts have spoken with numerous biologists who suggest the virus was likely created artificially.

ENL0C049DR3.000217.text: the virus was likely created artificially.

ENL0C049DR3.000218.text: According to UWI sources in the medical industry engaged in the study of COVID-19, the specific features of the novel coronavirus (rapid mutation, gradual weakening, etc.) show that it is synthetic, made in the laboratory.

ENL0C049DR3.000220.text: Of course, some American and mainstream media rushed to refute any arguments suggesting the virus was man-made.
